code: export var TOGGLE_FAVORITES="TOGGLE_FAVORITES";export var ADD_FAVORITE="ADD_FAVORITE";export var REMOVE_FAVORITE="REMOVE_FAVORITE";export var toggleFavorites=function toggleFavorites(){return{type:TOGGLE_FAVORITES};};export var addFavorite=function addFavorite(movie){return{type:ADD_FAVORITE,payload:movie};};export var removeFavorite=function removeFavorite(id){return{type:REMOVE_FAVORITE,payload:id};};
